scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:webpack && npm run build:types && cp CHANGELOG.md dist/libs/ng-mocks && cp README.md dist/libs/ng-mocks && cp LICENSE dist/libs/ng-mocks && cp libs/ng-mocks/package.json dist/libs/ng-mocks/package.json && cp libs/ng-mocks/migrations.json dist/libs/ng-mocks/migrations.json && cp examples/main/test.spec.ts dist/libs/ng-mocks/example.spec.ts
scripts.build:all: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.build:docs: cd docs && CI=true npm run build
scripts.e2e:a: npm run i:a && npm run e2e:a:fast
scripts.e2e:a:fast: npm run build && npm run clear:a && npm run s:a && npm run s:test:a && npm run test:a
scripts.i:e2e: npm run i:a5 && npm run i:a6 && npm run i:a7 && npm run i:a8 && npm run i:a9 && npm run i:a10 && npm run i:a11 && npm run i:a12 && npm run i:a13 && npm run i:a14 && npm run i:jasmine && npm run i:jest && npm run i:min && npm run i:nx
scripts.i:a5: npm run i:a5es5 && npm run i:a5es2015
scripts.s:e2e: npm run s:a5 && npm run s:a6 && npm run s:a7 && npm run s:a8 && npm run s:a9 && npm run s:a10 && npm run s:a11 && npm run s:a12 && npm run s:a13 && npm run s:a14 && npm run s:jasmine && npm run s:jest && npm run s:min && npm run s:nx
scripts.s:a5: npm run s:a5es5 && npm run s:a5es2015
scripts.clear:e2e: npm run clear:a5 && npm run clear:a6 && npm run clear:a7 && npm run clear:a8 && npm run clear:a9 && npm run clear:a10 && npm run clear:a11 && npm run clear:a12 && npm run clear:a13 && npm run clear:a14 && npm run clear:jasmine && npm run clear:jest && npm run clear:min && npm run clear:nx
scripts.clear:a5: npm run clear:a5es5 && npm run clear:a5es2015
scripts.s:test:e2e: npm run s:test:a5 && npm run s:test:a6 && npm run s:test:a7 && npm run s:test:a8 && npm run s:test:a9 && npm run s:test:a10 && npm run s:test:a11 && npm run s:test:a12 && npm run s:test:a13 && npm run s:test:a14 && npm run s:test:nx
scripts.s:test:a5: npm run s:test:a5es5 && npm run s:test:a5es2015
scripts.s:test:a5es5: P=e2e/a5es5/src/test && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R tests $P && cp -R examples $P && rm $P/examples/TestRoutingGuard/test.spec.ts && rm $P/examples/TestRoutingResolver/test.spec.ts
scripts.s:test:a5es2015: P=e2e/a5es2015/src/test && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R tests $P && cp -R examples $P && rm $P/examples/TestRoutingGuard/test.spec.ts && rm $P/examples/TestRoutingResolver/test.spec.ts
scripts.s:test:a6: P=e2e/a6/src/test && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R tests $P && cp -R examples $P
scripts.s:test:a7: P=e2e/a7/src/test && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R tests $P && cp -R examples $P

scripts.s:test:a10: P=e2e/a10/src/test && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R tests $P && cp -R examples $P
scripts.s:test:a11: P=e2e/a11/src/test && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R tests $P && cp -R examples $P
scripts.s:test:a12: P=e2e/a12/src/test && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R tests $P && cp -R examples $P

scripts.s:test:nx: P=e2e/nx/apps/a-nx/src/test && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R tests $P && cp -R examples $P
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:a5 && npm run test:a6 && npm run test:a7 && npm run test:a8 && npm run test:a9 && npm run test:a10 && npm run test:a11 && npm run test:a12 && npm run test:a13 && npm run test:a14 && npm run test:jasmine && npm run test:jest && npm run test:min && npm run test:nx
